name: Tachyonest
description:
Tachyonest is a movement based space third-person shooter, based on the likes of star control 2 and half life.

In Tachyonest, constant movement is the key to survival. If you stay still, you'll find your health dropping rapidly, eventually leading to your destruction. (Remember, the key is to KEEP MOVING!)

Tachyonest has several interesting features, such as:

Inertia-Based Movement: Your ship doesnt stop moving when you stop thrusting (because there is no atmosphere in space)

Endless Mode: For the undaunted players out there, dive into an endless mode, where the challenge never ceases.

New Combat Scenarios: Just when you think you've mastered the game, expect new combat scenarios, introduced on an irregular basis because im a little guy.

Free: The best things in life are free, and Tachyonest is no exception. Experience intense space combat without spending a dime.

Challenging Combat: This is not an easy game. It will test your skill, reflexes, and strategy. But remember, every defeat is just a lesson in how to win the next fight.

Get ready for a thrilling, relentless adventure. Prepare for Tachyonest, and happy ship shooting!


warnings: minor cursing
